products.title: Vapour Jasmine Vertical Blind
products.description: Vapour is a woven jaquard fabric available in popular subtle shades. This fabric is a high quality fabric and is manufactured in the uk. Vapour jasmine vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Spectrum, Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Beautiful, creamy beige will fill your windows when you use the spectrum alabasta. The gleaming gloss finish offsets the high quality and durability of the heavy gauge aluminium slats, whilst still maintaining an air of elegance and sophistication. Soften bold reds and deep purples in the dining room or bedroom by placing the alabasta amongst rich, block colour walls, and accenting with matching creams and beiges.

products.title: Spectrum, Deep Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.description: The rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye blind that will stand the test of time. Use the alabasta to complement deep purples or forest greens in the living room, den, or dining room, where it will create a subtle break to rich colours.

products.title: Antiviral Parchment Roller Blind
products.description: Warm, homely and effortlessly versatile, this timelessly stylish roller is not quite as straightforward as it may seem. It's only the sunlight that will gently filter through the material, as a special additive coats the fabric and helps to prevent virus particles from settling, warm, homely and effortlessly versatile, this timelessly stylish roller is not quite as straightforward as it may seem.

products.title: Roma, Mushroom - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in mushroom is the classic neutral. In an unassuming natural beige, it works as an attractive canvas for the rest of your decor. The fabric is durable and high-quality, as is the entire roma range, and is a worthy investment for a long-lasting window dressing. Pair the mushroom with fellow naturals, using everything from barely-there biscuits to delicious chocolate browns. Ensure at least part of the decor features strong colours with which to contrast against this natural tone, and include woods and wickers for a rustic feel.

products.title: Gloss Beige Aluminium Venetian
products.description: If you're looking for a gloss beige aluminium venetian blind, look no more as this is the one for you. There isn't much more we can say about this silky, glossy beige aluminium slat other than how great it looks. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.description: The amor beige colour is perfect for matching in with magnolia walls and rooms of a neutral tone. The blackout and moisture resistant qualities of these blinds only adds to their appeal. products.title: Dorset Sand Roller Blind
products.description: With it's fun seaside themed pattern, the dorset sand roller blind is perfect for anyone living by the coast or who loves the beach. The seaside theme consists of all the usual suspects, like a lighthouse, lobster, starfish and the odd troublesome seagull. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Pvc Blackout Beige Roller Blind
